Individual-Based Rarefaction

Source: R/rarefy.R
rarefy.Rd

Compute classic individual-based rarefaction curves. This complements the sample-based accumulation in spacc().

Usage

rarefy(x, n_individuals = NULL, n_boot = 100L)

Arguments

x

A site-by-species matrix with abundance data (not presence/absence).

n_individuals

Integer vector. Sample sizes to compute expected richness for. Default NULL computes for all levels from 1 to total.

n_boot

Integer. Number of bootstrap replicates for CI. Default 100.

Value

An object of class spacc_rare containing:

n

Sample sizes

expected

Expected species richness

sd

Standard deviation

lower, upper

95% confidence bounds

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# With abundance data
rare <- rarefy(abundance_matrix)
plot(rare)
} # }
